Special Interests: To improve the livelihood avenues for very poor people in South India in general and in his constituency and in Tamil Nadu in particular
Educational Qualifications: Higher Secondary Educated at Danish Mission High School, Tiruvannamalai, Tamil Nadu
Other Information: President, Agriculture Sales & Marketing Cooperative Society, Tiruvannamalai, 1989; Vice-President, Cooperative Sugar Mills, Kallakurichi, South Arcot, Tamil Nadu, 1972-76; Branch Post Master, Kattampoondi, 1963-65; imprisoned for 42 days for burning a copy of I.P.C., 1986
Name: Venugopal,Thiru Danapal
Positions Held:
1965-1969
President, Village Panchayat Board, Kattampoondi

1970-1975
Chairman, Panchayat Union, Distt. Tiruvannamalai

1977-80 and 1980-84
Member, Tamil Nadu Legislative Assembly (two terms)

since 1982 to till now
President, Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (D.M.K.), Distt. Committee, Tiruvannamalai

1996- 1997
Elected to 11th Lok Sabha

1996-98
Member, Committee on Urban and Rural Development

1998 - 1999
Re-elected to 12th Lok Sabha (2nd term)

1998-1999
Member, Committee on Transport and Tourism
Member, Consultative Committee, Ministry of Rural Areas and Employment

1999 - 2004
Re-elected to 13th Lok Sabha (3rd term)

1999-2000
Member, Committee on Urban and Rural Development

2000-2004
Member, Consultative Committee, Ministry of Health and Family Welfare

2004 - 2009
Re-elected to 14th Lok Sabha( 4th term)
Member, Committee to Review the Rate of Dividend Payble by the Railway Undertaking to General Revenues
Member, Committee on Science & Technology, Environment & Forests

5 Aug. 2007- May 2009
Member, Committee on Chemicals & Fertilizers

2009
Re-elected to 15th Lok Sabha (5th term)

31 Aug. 2009
Member, Committee on Food, Consumer Affairs and Public Distribution
